020import net.tnemc.core.TNECore;
021import net.tnemc.core.account.Account;
022import net.tnemc.core.hook.papi.Placeholder;
023import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
024import org.jetbrains.annotations.Nullable;
025
026import java.util.Date;
027import java.util.Optional;
028
029/**
030 * AccountCreatedPlaceholder
031 *
032 * @author creatorfromhell
033 * @since 0.1.4.0
034 */
035public class InfoCreatedPlaceholder implements Placeholder {
036
037  /**
038   * Retrieves the identifier associated with this symbol.
039   *
040   * @return The identifier as a string
041   */
042  @Override
043  public String identifier() {
044
045    return "tne_account_created";
046  }
047
048  /**
049   * Checks if the specified parameters are valid for this method.
050   *
051   * @param params The parameters to be checked
052   *
053   * @return True if the parameters are valid, false otherwise
054   */
055  @Override
056  public boolean applies(final String[] params) {
057
058    return params[0].equalsIgnoreCase("account") && params.length >= 3
059           && params[1].equalsIgnoreCase("created");
060  }
061
062  /**
063   * Processes a request with the given account and parameters.
064   *
065   * @param account Optional account associated with the request
066   * @param params  Required parameters for the request
067   *
068   * @return Nullable string response from the request process
069   */
070  @Override
071  public @Nullable String onRequest(@Nullable final String account, @NotNull final String[] params) {
072
073    final Optional<Account> accountOptional = TNECore.eco().account().findAccount(params[2]);
074
075    if(accountOptional.isEmpty()) {
076      return null;
077    }
078
079    return TNECore.eco().transaction().getFormat().format(new Date(accountOptional.get().getCreationDate()));
080  }
081}
